text: kya toone us par bhee nazar nahin kee ki yaqeenan khuda hee abr ko chalaata hai phir vahee baaham use jodata hai-phir vahee use tah ba tah rakhata hai tab too to baarish usake daramiyaan se nikalate hue dekhata hai aur aasamaan mein jo (jame hue baadalon ke) pahaad hai unamen se vahee use barasaata hai- phir unhen jis (ke sar) par chaahata hai pahuncha deta hai- aur jis (ke sar) se chaahata hai taal deta hai- qareeb hai ki usakee bijalee kee kaund aakhon kee raushanee uchake liye jaatee hai
